meanings.definition: Decorated with a raised design or pattern.
meanings.sent1: The brocaded curtains added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: She wore a brocaded dress to the fancy party.
meanings.sent3: The brocaded pillow looked like it was wearing a fancy suit.
meanings.sent4: The brocaded walls whispered stories of ancient royalty.
meanings.sent5: The brocaded tapestry shimmered in the candlelight, mesmerizing all who beheld it.

meanings.sent1: The brocaded tablecloth felt luxurious to the touch.
meanings.sent2: He gifted her a brocaded scarf from his travels.
meanings.sent3: The brocaded chair seemed to have a secret love for comfort.
meanings.sent4: Her brocaded purse held all her treasures like a royal treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The brocaded robe flowed around her like a river of silk.
